Gratz on lvl 13! I hope you enjoyed this DEMO of my 1-60 Horde Randomized. 1-60 100% AFK Horde RANDOMIZED will be available to the public very soon! You can tune into my stream daily to see the progress, or join my Discord Channel (look at my 1-60 Alliance Randomized Forum post for info!) -- Thanks a lot! Hope to hear any feedback you have.!
